name: Champ Wants Salami
description:
Could this be my dumbest project yet?

"Heck yeah, dawg."

introducing the pinnacle of gaming...

CHAMP WANTS SALAMI

Champ is a good boy. He wants a little salami, but he has a terrible sense of direction and chases his tail often. You, the player, must guide Champ to his destiny. His fate. His Salami.

FEATURING:

  • Dog.jpeg!
  • music!
  •  he barks when you hit stuff!
  • controls about as reliable as trying to navigate a real untrained dog through a maze!
  • hidden features!
  • glitches!
  • ugly yelllow blue & grey 'Dogvision'  visuals!

Made as part of a student game jam. The Task: make a game, as a team, in 5 days, which can be played using only a single button. Unfortunately, I wasn't around for 3 of those days, and didn't have a team. NONETHELESS, I present to you: Champ Wants Salami.

CONTROLS

SPACE BAR  - Guide pup 

MOUSE - navigate menu

ESC  - emergency quit

This was a fun throwaway project mostly made for laughs, I think I spent more effort on the audio (and a secret easter egg) than anything else in the game, but I hope you can have fun with it still!

Enjoy! And if you get the chance, pet a dog on my behalf <3
